original: Moberg, Bengt Ivar, iäroverksiad-junkt, Borås, f. 19/2/01 i Skara av trafikchef Manfred M. o. h. h. f. Granath. G. 44 m. Sigrid Ericson. — Stud :ex. i Skara 20, fil. kand. 28, fil. mag. 30, fil. .lic. 34, fil. dr 38, provår i StMm 38-39. Res. t. Tyskl., Frankr. o. Belg. 31, Ungern 32, Fink 33, Danm. 35, Schweiz o. Ital. 37. E. adj. i Härnösand 39, Falun 40-41, Malmö 41-43, adj. i hist. o. geogr. v. Borås h. a. 1. sed. 43. Aman. v. Sthlm^s högsk. geogr. inst. 33-35. Medl. av Nord. fam:boks red. 30-31. Lär. v. Hermods prep ikurs’ f. stud :ex. 42 o. 43, styrded. i De sju här. kult:-hist. fören. Skr.: Gotland um d. Jahr 1700 (akad. avh. 38) samt art. o. upps. i uppsil :ver!k o. andra publ.
translated: Moberg, Bengt Ivar, born 19/2/01 in Skara to traffic manager Manfred M. and his wife Granath. Married in 1944 to Sigrid Ericson. Education: Graduated from Skara secondary school in 1920, Bachelor of Arts in 1928, Master of Arts in 1930, Licentiate of Philosophy in 1934, Doctor of Philosophy in 1938. Interned in Germany, France, and Belgium in 1931, Hungary in 1932, Finland in 1933, Denmark in 1935, Switzerland and Italy in 1937. Assistant teacher in Härnösand in 1939, Falun in 1940-1941, Malmö in 1941-1943, and assistant professor of history and geography at Borås College since 1943. Assistant at Stockholm University's geography institute from 1933-1935. Member of the editorial board of the Nordic Family Book in 1930-1931. Teacher at Hermod's preparation courses for university entrance exams in 1942 and 1943, and board member of the Seven Army Districts Cultural-Historical Association. Written works include "Gotland around the year 1700" (thesis in 1938), as well as articles and essays in various publications.

occupation.roleName: Assistant Professor of History and Geography at Borås College

otherWorks.name: Various articles and essays in different publications
